main event: A blue-green light was sighted in Kinston, North Carolina on 13 September 1954.
interesting points: The light was described as oval and slightly smaller than a football., The sighting lasted for 3 to 5 seconds., The object was traveling at a high speed of 600 mph., The observation was made using ground radar and air visual methods., No explanation for the sighting was provided in the report.
witness description: 1st Lt Col Charles B. Langklotter, involved in the ground search flight
